midas/drivers/class/slowdev.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003   Name:         slowdev.c
00004   Created by:   Pierre-Andre Amaudruz
00005 
00006   Contents:     Slow Device Generic Class Driver
00007   Based on the generic class driver, implements a check channel
00008   in the idle task based on circular/alternate on minimum of
00009   n raised channels + one. See doc for further explanation.
00010 
00011   $Log: slowdev.c,v $
00012   Revision 1.1.1.1  2005/06/20 23:37:09  mucap
00013   Importing release 1.9.5 of the MIDAS source code as distributed by PSI.
00014   (Next, I'll commit our local customizations.)
00015 
00016   Revision 1.2  2004/01/08 08:40:08  midas
00017   Implemented standard indentation
00018 
00019   Revision 1.1  2002/05/10 05:47:37  pierre
00020   based on generic + idle on N raised + 1
00021 
00022 
00023 \********************************************************************/
00024 
00025 #include <stdio.h>
00026 #include "midas.h"
00027 #include "ybos.h"
00028 
00029 #define ODB_UPDATE_TIME 5000
00030 
00031 typedef struct {
00032 
00033    /* ODB keys */
00034    HNDLE hKeyRoot, hKeyDemand, hKeyMeasured;
00035 
00036    /* globals */
00037    INT num_channels;
00038    INT format;
00039    DWORD last_update;
00040    INT last_channel;
00041 
00042    /* items in /Variables record */
00043    float *demand;
00044    float *measured;
00045    BOOL *raised;
00046 
00047    /* items in /Settings */
00048    char *names;
00049    float *update_threshold;
00050 
00051    /* mirror arrays */
00052    float *demand_mirror;
00053    float *measured_mirror;
00054    DWORD *last_change;
00055 
00056    void **driver;
00057    INT *channel_offset;
00058    void **dd_info;
00059 
00060 } GEN_INFO;
00061 
00062 #define DRIVER(_i) ((INT (*)(INT cmd, ...))(gen_info->driver[_i]))
00063 
00064 #ifndef abs
00065 #define abs(a) (((a) < 0)   ? -(a) : (a))
00066 #endif

00069 
00070 static void free_mem(GEN_INFO * gen_info)
00071 {
00072    free(gen_info->names);
00073    free(gen_info->demand);
00074    free(gen_info->measured);
00075    free(gen_info->raised);
00076 
00077    free(gen_info->update_threshold);
00078 
00079    free(gen_info->demand_mirror);
00080    free(gen_info->measured_mirror);
00081    free(gen_info->last_change);
00082 
00083    free(gen_info->dd_info);
00084    free(gen_info->channel_offset);
00085    free(gen_info->driver);
00086 
00087    free(gen_info);
00088 }

00090 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00091 
00092 INT gen_read(EQUIPMENT * pequipment, int channel)
00093 {
00094    int i, status;
00095    float max_diff;
00096    DWORD act_time, min_time;
00097    BOOL changed;
00098    GEN_INFO *gen_info;
00099    HNDLE hDB;
00100 
00101   /*---- read measured value ----*/
00102    gen_info = (GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00103    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00104 
00105    /* Get channel value */
00106    status = DRIVER(channel) (CMD_GET, gen_info->dd_info[channel],
00107                              channel - gen_info->channel_offset[channel],
00108                              &gen_info->measured[channel]);
00109 
00110   /*---- read demand value ----*/
00111    status = DRIVER(channel) (CMD_GET_DEMAND, gen_info->dd_info[channel],
00112                              channel - gen_info->channel_offset[channel],
00113                              &gen_info->demand[channel]);
00114 
00115    if (gen_info->demand[channel] != gen_info->demand_mirror[channel]) {
00116       gen_info->demand_mirror[channel] = gen_info->demand[channel];
00117       db_set_data(hDB, gen_info->hKeyDemand, gen_info->demand,
00118                   sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels, gen_info->num_channels,
00119                   TID_FLOAT);
00120    }
00121 
00122    return status;
00123 }
00124 
00125 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00126 
00127 void gen_demand(INT hDB, INT hKey, void *info)
00128 {
00129    INT i, status;
00130    GEN_INFO *gen_info;
00131    EQUIPMENT *pequipment;
00132 
00133    pequipment = (EQUIPMENT *) info;
00134    gen_info = (GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00135 
00136    /* set individual channels only if demand value differs */
00137    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++)
00138       if (gen_info->demand[i] != gen_info->demand_mirror[i]) {
00139          status = DRIVER(i) (CMD_SET, gen_info->dd_info[i],
00140                              i - gen_info->channel_offset[i], gen_info->demand[i]);
00141          gen_info->demand_mirror[i] = gen_info->demand[i];
00142          gen_info->last_change[i] = ss_millitime();
00143       }
00144 
00145    pequipment->odb_in++;
00146 }

00149 
00150 void gen_update_label(INT hDB, INT hKey, void *info)
00151 {
00152    INT i, status;
00153    GEN_INFO *gen_info;
00154    EQUIPMENT *pequipment;
00155 
00156    pequipment = (EQUIPMENT *) info;
00157    gen_info = (GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00158 
00159    /* update channel labels based on the midas channel names */
00160    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++)
00161       status = DRIVER(i) (CMD_SET_LABEL, gen_info->dd_info[i],
00162                           i - gen_info->channel_offset[i],
00163                           gen_info->names + NAME_LENGTH * i);
00164 }

00166 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00167 
00168 INT gen_init(EQUIPMENT * pequipment)
00169 {
00170    int status, size, i, j, index, offset;
00171    char str[256];
00172    HNDLE hDB, hKey, hNames;
00173    GEN_INFO *gen_info;
00174 
00175    /* allocate private data */
00176    pequipment->cd_info = calloc(1, sizeof(GEN_INFO));
00177    gen_info = (GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00178 
00179    /* get class driver root key */
00180    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00181    sprintf(str, "/Equipment/%s", pequipment->name);
00182    db_create_key(hDB, 0, str, TID_KEY);
00183    db_find_key(hDB, 0, str, &gen_info->hKeyRoot);
00184 
00185    /* save event format */
00186    size = sizeof(str);
00187    db_get_value(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Common/Format", str, &size, TID_STRING, TRUE);
00188 
00189    if (equal_ustring(str, "Fixed"))
00190       gen_info->format = FORMAT_FIXED;
00191    else if (equal_ustring(str, "MIDAS"))
00192       gen_info->format = FORMAT_MIDAS;
00193    else if (equal_ustring(str, "YBOS"))
00194       gen_info->format = FORMAT_YBOS;
00195 
00196    /* count total number of channels */
00197    db_create_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Channels", TID_KEY);
00198    db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Channels", &hKey);
00199 
00200    for (i = 0, gen_info->num_channels = 0; pequipment->driver[i].name[0]; i++) {
00201       /* ODB value has priority over driver list in channel number */
00202       size = sizeof(INT);
00203       db_get_value(hDB, hKey, pequipment->driver[i].name,
00204                    &pequipment->driver[i].channels, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00205 
00206       if (pequipment->driver[i].channels == 0)
00207          pequipment->driver[i].channels = 1;
00208 
00209       gen_info->num_channels += pequipment->driver[i].channels;
00210    }
00211 
00212    if (gen_info->num_channels == 0) {
00213       cm_msg(MERROR, "hv_init", "No channels found in device driver list");
00214       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00215    }
00216 
00217    /* Allocate memory for buffers */
00218    gen_info->names = (char *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, NAME_LENGTH);
00219 
00220    gen_info->demand = (float *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00221    gen_info->measured = (float *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00222    gen_info->raised = (BOOL *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(BOOL));
00223 
00224    gen_info->update_threshold = (float *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00225 
00226    gen_info->demand_mirror = (float *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00227    gen_info->measured_mirror = (float *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(float));
00228    gen_info->last_change = (DWORD *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(DWORD));
00229 
00230    gen_info->dd_info = (void *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(void *));
00231    gen_info->channel_offset = (INT *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(INT));
00232    gen_info->driver = (void *) calloc(gen_info->num_channels, sizeof(void *));
00233 
00234    if (!gen_info->driver) {
00235       cm_msg(MERROR, "hv_init", "Not enough memory");
00236       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00237    }
00238 
00239   /*---- Initialize device drivers ----*/
00240 
00241    /* call init method */
00242    for (i = 0; pequipment->driver[i].name[0]; i++) {
00243       sprintf(str, "Settings/Devices/%s", pequipment->driver[i].name);
00244       status = db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, str, &hKey);
00245       if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00246          db_create_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, str, TID_KEY);
00247          status = db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, str, &hKey);
00248          if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00249             cm_msg(MERROR, "hv_init", "Cannot create %s entry in online database", str);
00250             free_mem(gen_info);
00251             return FE_ERR_ODB;
00252          }
00253       }
00254 
00255       status = pequipment->driver[i].dd(CMD_INIT, hKey, &pequipment->driver[i].dd_info,
00256                                         pequipment->driver[i].channels,
00257                                         pequipment->driver[i].cmd_disabled);
00258       if (status != FE_SUCCESS) {
00259          free_mem(gen_info);
00260          return status;
00261       }
00262    }
00263 
00264    /* compose device driver channel assignment */
00265    for (i = 0, j = 0, index = 0, offset = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++, j++) {
00266       while (j >= pequipment->driver[index].channels && pequipment->driver[index].name[0]) {
00267          offset += j;
00268          index++;
00269          j = 0;
00270       }
00271 
00272       gen_info->driver[i] = pequipment->driver[index].dd;
00273       gen_info->dd_info[i] = pequipment->driver[index].dd_info;
00274       gen_info->channel_offset[i] = offset;
00275    }
00276 
00277   /*---- create demand variables ----*/
00278 
00279    /* get demand from ODB */
00280    status =
00281        db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Demand", &gen_info->hKeyDemand);
00282    if (status == DB_SUCCESS) {
00283       size = sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels;
00284       db_get_data(hDB, gen_info->hKeyDemand, gen_info->demand, &size, TID_FLOAT);
00285    }
00286    /* let device driver overwrite demand values, if it supports it */
00287    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++) {
00288       DRIVER(i) (CMD_GET_DEMAND, gen_info->dd_info[i],
00289                  i - gen_info->channel_offset[i], &gen_info->demand[i]);
00290       gen_info->demand_mirror[i] = -12345.f;    /* invalid value */
00291    }
00292    /* write back demand values */
00293    status =
00294        db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Demand", &gen_info->hKeyDemand);
00295    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00296       db_create_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Demand", TID_FLOAT);
00297       db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Demand", &gen_info->hKeyDemand);
00298    }
00299    size = sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels;
00300    db_set_data(hDB, gen_info->hKeyDemand, gen_info->demand, size,
00301                gen_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00302    db_open_record(hDB, gen_info->hKeyDemand, gen_info->demand,
00303                   gen_info->num_channels * sizeof(float), MODE_READ, gen_demand,
00304                   pequipment);
00305 
00306   /*---- create measured variables ----*/
00307    db_merge_data(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Measured",
00308                  gen_info->measured, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels,
00309                  gen_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00310    db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Variables/Measured", &gen_info->hKeyMeasured);
00311    memcpy(gen_info->measured_mirror, gen_info->measured,
00312           gen_info->num_channels * sizeof(float));
00313 
00314   /*---- get default names from device driver ----*/
00315    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++) {
00316       sprintf(gen_info->names + NAME_LENGTH * i, "Default%%CH %d", i);
00317       DRIVER(i) (CMD_GET_DEFAULT_NAME, gen_info->dd_info[i],
00318                  i - gen_info->channel_offset[i], gen_info->names + NAME_LENGTH * i);
00319    }
00320    db_merge_data(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Names",
00321                  gen_info->names, NAME_LENGTH * gen_info->num_channels,
00322                  gen_info->num_channels, TID_STRING);
00323 
00324   /*---- set labels form midas SC names ----*/
00325    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++) {
00326       gen_info = (GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00327       DRIVER(i) (CMD_SET_LABEL, gen_info->dd_info[i],
00328                  i - gen_info->channel_offset[i], gen_info->names + NAME_LENGTH * i);
00329    }
00330 
00331    /* open hotlink on channel names */
00332    if (db_find_key(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Names", &hNames) == DB_SUCCESS)
00333       db_open_record(hDB, hNames, gen_info->names, NAME_LENGTH * gen_info->num_channels,
00334                      MODE_READ, gen_update_label, pequipment);
00335 
00336   /*---- get default update threshold from device driver ----*/
00337    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++) {
00338       gen_info->update_threshold[i] = 2.f;      /* default 2 units */
00339       DRIVER(i) (CMD_GET_DEFAULT_THRESHOLD, gen_info->dd_info[i],
00340                  i - gen_info->channel_offset[i], &gen_info->update_threshold[i]);
00341    }
00342    db_merge_data(hDB, gen_info->hKeyRoot, "Settings/Update Threshold Measured",
00343                  gen_info->update_threshold, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels,
00344                  gen_info->num_channels, TID_FLOAT);
00345 
00346   /*---- set initial demand values ----*/
00347    gen_demand(hDB, gen_info->hKeyDemand, pequipment);
00348 
00349    /* initially read all channels */
00350    for (i = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++)
00351       gen_read(pequipment, i);
00352 
00353    return FE_SUCCESS;
00354 }

00356 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00357 
00358 INT gen_exit(EQUIPMENT * pequipment)
00359 {
00360    INT i;
00361 
00362    free_mem((GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info);
00363 
00364    /* call exit method of device drivers */
00365    for (i = 0; pequipment->driver[i].dd != NULL; i++)
00366       pequipment->driver[i].dd(CMD_EXIT, pequipment->driver[i].dd_info);
00367 
00368    return FE_SUCCESS;
00369 }
00370 
00371 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00372 INT gen_idle(EQUIPMENT * pequipment)
00373 {
00374    static BOOL odb_update_flag = FALSE;
00375    static INT last_raised_channel = -1;
00376    static INT number_raised = 0;
00377    INT act, i, next_raised, status;
00378    DWORD act_time, loop;
00379    GEN_INFO *gen_info;
00380    HNDLE hDB;
00381 
00382    /* Class info shortcut */
00383    gen_info = (GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00384 
00385    /* get current time */
00386    act_time = ss_millitime();
00387 
00388    /* Do loop N channel per idle */
00389    for (loop = 0; loop < number_raised + 1; loop++) {
00390 
00391       /* Select channel to read */
00392       /* k = last_raised_channel; */
00393 
00394       if (last_raised_channel < 0) {
00395          /* Normal channel */
00396          act = (gen_info->last_channel + 1) % gen_info->num_channels;
00397 //      printf("N     :%d ", act);
00398       } else {
00399          /* Raised channel */
00400          act = last_raised_channel;
00401 //      printf("    R :%d ", act);
00402       }
00403 
00404       /* Read channel */
00405       status = gen_read(pequipment, act);
00406 
00407       /* Check read value against previous value (mirror) */
00408       if (abs(gen_info->measured[act] - gen_info->measured_mirror[act]) >
00409           gen_info->update_threshold[act]) {
00410          /* Greater than Delta => raise channel for close monitoring */
00411          gen_info->raised[act] = TRUE;
00412          /* Force an ODB update to reflect change */
00413          odb_update_flag = TRUE;
00414       } else {
00415          /* Within the limits => lower channel if it was raised */
00416          gen_info->raised[act] = FALSE;
00417       }
00418 
00419 //    printf("F:%d mes:%f mir:%f th:%f\n", gen_info->raised[act]
00420 //         , gen_info->measured[act]
00421 //         ,gen_info->measured_mirror[act], gen_info->update_threshold[act]);
00422 
00423       /* hold last value */
00424       gen_info->measured_mirror[act] = gen_info->measured[act];
00425 
00426       /* Get next raised channel if any (-1:none) */
00427       if (act == gen_info->num_channels) {
00428          next_raised = -1;
00429       } else {
00430          for (next_raised = act + 1; next_raised < gen_info->num_channels; next_raised++) {
00431             if (gen_info->raised[next_raised])
00432                break;
00433          }
00434          if (next_raised == gen_info->num_channels) {
00435             next_raised = -1;
00436          }
00437       }
00438 
00439       /* update last raised channel for next go */
00440       if (next_raised < 0) {
00441          /* no more raised channel set normal channel (increment channel) */
00442          gen_info->last_channel = (gen_info->last_channel + 1) % gen_info->num_channels;
00443          last_raised_channel = -1;
00444       } else {
00445          /* More raised channel then set for next round */
00446          last_raised_channel = next_raised;
00447       }
00448 
00449       /* count the raised channels
00450          to be used for possible multiple read per idle
00451          see for loop at begining of function.
00452        */
00453       for (i = 0, number_raised = 0; i < gen_info->num_channels; i++) {
00454          if (gen_info->raised[i])
00455             number_raised++;
00456       }
00457    }
00458 
00459    /* sends new values to ODB if:
00460       ODB_UPDATE_TIME timeout exceeded
00461       or
00462       At least one channel has been raised */
00463    if (odb_update_flag || ((act_time - gen_info->last_update) > ODB_UPDATE_TIME)) {
00464       cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00465       db_set_data(hDB, gen_info->hKeyMeasured, gen_info->measured,
00466                   sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels, gen_info->num_channels,
00467                   TID_FLOAT);
00468       gen_info->last_update = act_time;
00469       odb_update_flag = FALSE;
00470 
00471       /* Keep odb count */
00472       pequipment->odb_out++;
00473    }
00474    return status;
00475 }
00476 
00477 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00478 INT cd_gen_read(char *pevent, int offset)
00479 {
00480    float *pdata;
00481    DWORD *pdw;
00482    GEN_INFO *gen_info;
00483    EQUIPMENT *pequipment;
00484 
00485    pequipment = *((EQUIPMENT **) pevent);
00486    gen_info = (GEN_INFO *) pequipment->cd_info;
00487 
00488    if (gen_info->format == FORMAT_FIXED) {
00489       memcpy(pevent, gen_info->demand, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels);
00490       pevent += sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels;
00491 
00492       memcpy(pevent, gen_info->measured, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels);
00493       pevent += sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels;
00494 
00495       return 2 * sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels;
00496    } else if (gen_info->format == FORMAT_MIDAS) {
00497       bk_init(pevent);
00498 
00499       /* create DMND bank */
00500       bk_create(pevent, "DMND", TID_FLOAT, &pdata);
00501       memcpy(pdata, gen_info->demand, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels);
00502       pdata += gen_info->num_channels;
00503       bk_close(pevent, pdata);
00504 
00505       /* create MSRD bank */
00506       bk_create(pevent, "MSRD", TID_FLOAT, &pdata);
00507       memcpy(pdata, gen_info->measured, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels);
00508       pdata += gen_info->num_channels;
00509       bk_close(pevent, pdata);
00510 
00511       return bk_size(pevent);
00512    } else if (gen_info->format == FORMAT_YBOS) {
00513       ybk_init((DWORD *) pevent);
00514 
00515       /* create EVID bank */
00516       ybk_create((DWORD *) pevent, "EVID", I4_BKTYPE, (DWORD *) (&pdw));
00517       *(pdw)++ = EVENT_ID(pevent);      /* Event_ID + Mask */
00518       *(pdw)++ = SERIAL_NUMBER(pevent); /* Serial number */
00519       *(pdw)++ = TIME_STAMP(pevent);    /* Time Stamp */
00520       ybk_close((DWORD *) pevent, pdw);
00521 
00522       /* create DMND bank */
00523       ybk_create((DWORD *) pevent, "DMND", F4_BKTYPE, (DWORD *) & pdata);
00524       memcpy(pdata, gen_info->demand, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels);
00525       pdata += gen_info->num_channels;
00526       ybk_close((DWORD *) pevent, pdata);
00527 
00528       /* create MSRD bank */
00529       ybk_create((DWORD *) pevent, "MSRD", F4_BKTYPE, (DWORD *) & pdata);
00530       memcpy(pdata, gen_info->measured, sizeof(float) * gen_info->num_channels);
00531       pdata += gen_info->num_channels;
00532       ybk_close((DWORD *) pevent, pdata);
00533 
00534       return ybk_size((DWORD *) pevent);
00535    } else
00536       return 0;
00537 }
00538 
00539 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00540 
00541 INT cd_gen(INT cmd, EQUIPMENT * pequipment)
00542 {
00543    INT status;
00544 
00545    switch (cmd) {
00546    case CMD_INIT:
00547       status = gen_init(pequipment);
00548       break;
00549 
00550    case CMD_EXIT:
00551       status = gen_exit(pequipment);
00552       break;
00553 
00554    case CMD_IDLE:
00555       status = gen_idle(pequipment);
00556       break;
00557 
00558    default:
00559       cm_msg(MERROR, "Generic class driver", "Received unknown command %d", cmd);
00560       status = FE_ERR_DRIVER;
00561       break;
00562    }
00563 
00564    return status;
00565 }
